body_html: @pseudotensor Hi, I don't know the reason why the scope is messed-up clearly when the graph and optimizer are in the same scope. I guess that some variables like "cnn_1_cnn/weights/Adam/" can not create in the scope, so i initialize the tf.train.Adam out of the scope.

body: @pseudotensor Hi, I don't know the reason why the scope is messed-up clearly when the graph and optimizer are in the same scope. I guess that some variables like "cnn_1_cnn/weights/Adam/" can not create in the scope, so i initialize the tf.train.Adam out of the scope.
